Require encryption at rest for attached Amazon EBS volumes
Description: EBS volumes should be encrypted at rest using AWS KMS

Title: Disallow Amazon EBS snapshots from being publicly restorable
Description: EBS snapshots should not be publicly restorable by all AWS accounts

Title: Disallow public accessibility for RDS database instances
Description: RDS instances should not have the PubliclyAccessible flag set to true

Title: Require minimum TLS version 1.3 for Amazon S3 requests
Description: S3 bucket policies should deny requests using TLS versions less than 1.3

Title: Require encryption in transit for Amazon S3 access
Description: S3 buckets should require HTTPS for all data transfers

Title: Restrict AWS KMS usage to org IAM principals or AWS services
Description: KMS key policies should only allow access from organization principals

Title: Require Lambda function URLs to use IAM-based authentication
Description: Lambda function URLs should not allow public unauthenticated access
